pages.text: These upgrades will improve certain aspects of the machine like speed and energy usage.$(br2)The machine will use upgrades inserted in the 4 right-side slots on its interface.
This upgrade will increase the machine's processing speed at cost of energy.
This upgrade will decrease the machine's energy cost.
This upgrade will increase the machine's internal energy capacity.
This upgrade will make the Electric Furnace accept Blast Furnace recipes.
This upgrade will make the Electric Furnace accept Smoker recipes.
